thread.title: Returning back to India with different nationality
thread.title_full: Returning back to India with different nationality

author: Sultanadvisor
title: Returning back to India with different nationality
text: # 1 Hello. My name is Sultan from KSA I have been in India for like 6 years my RP expired for like 6 months and FRO Pune told me that they will deport me to KSA so they did now I'm in KSA I tried to apply T-visa but it gets rejected and I want to take UAE nationality as my wife from UAE. My question is will my T-visa get rejected if I apply it with different passport like UAE not KSA. Thanks.
